examples: The classroom is filled with desks, chairs, and a chalkboard.
The teacher placed the books on the desk.
My computer is placed on the desk in the office.
He gave her ticket to the woman at the check-in desk.
The receptionist sat behind the desk, welcoming visitors.
words.defineEn: furniture we use for working, writing, reading, etc. that normally has a flat surface and drawers
words.defineVi: đồ nội thất chúng tôi sử dụng để làm việc, viết, đọc, v.v. thường có bề mặt phẳng và ngăn kéo

examples: The classroom has rows of chairs for students.
That chair doesn't give.
Our dining table has four chairs around it.
We moved our chairs a little nearer.
He dropped his briefcase on a chair.
words.defineEn: furniture with a back and often four legs that a person can use for sitting
words.defineVi: đồ nội thất có lưng và thường có bốn chân mà một người có thể sử dụng để ngồi

examples: His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
At a family reunion picnic, the buffet table showcased a classic beef plate roast.
This business method takes the risk of failure out of the table.
She set the table with plates and glasses in the dining room.
We set the table with plates and silverware.
words.defineEn: furniture with a usually flat surface on top of one or multiple legs that we can sit at or put things on
words.defineVi: đồ nội thất có bề mặt thường bằng phẳng trên một hoặc nhiều chân mà chúng ta có thể ngồi hoặc đặt đồ vật lên

examples: The leather sofa adds a touch of elegance to the room.
The sofa had to serve as a bed.
The sofa provides a great place to take an afternoon nap.
The old sofa will have to go.
The new sofa wouldn't fit into the small living room.
words.defineEn: a comfortable seat that has a back and two arms and enough space for two or multiple people to sit on
words.defineVi: một chỗ ngồi thoải mái có lưng và hai cánh tay và đủ không gian cho hai hoặc nhiều người ngồi

examples: She sent the kids to bed early.
The price includes dinner, bed, and breakfast.
The sofa had to serve as a bed.
I have a bedside table next to my bed for my books and glasses.
I usually go to bed around 11 o'clock.
words.defineEn: furniture we use to sleep on that normally has a frame and mattress
words.defineVi: đồ nội thất chúng ta sử dụng để ngủ thường có khung và nệm

examples: The fridge has a freezer section for storing frozen foods.
Milk and cream should keep quite well in a fridge.
The fridge door has a magnetic strip to hold notes and pictures.
I opened the fridge to get a bottle of water.
I put leftovers in the fridge to save them for later.
words.defineEn: a container, usually put in a kitchen, that uses electricity to keep food cool and fresh
words.defineVi: một thùng chứa, thường được đặt trong nhà bếp, sử dụng điện để giữ cho thực phẩm tươi và mát

examples: The furniture store has a wide section of sofas, tables, and chairs.
For generations, people have made furniture out of what was available.
My sister rearranged the furniture in her room to create more space.
We bought new furniture for our bedroom, including a bed and a wardrobe.
The dining room has a table and chairs as furniture.
words.defineEn: pieces of equipment such as tables, desks, beds, etc. that we put in a house or office so that it becomes suitable for living or working in
words.defineVi: các thiết bị như bàn, bàn, giường, v.v. mà chúng ta đặt trong một ngôi nhà hoặc văn phòng để nó trở nên phù hợp để sống hoặc làm việc trong đó

examples: The carpet only reached halfway across the room.
The carpet has worn thin in places.
The Persian carpet in the living room adds elegance and style to the space.
The soft carpet feels nice under my feet.
She covered the floor with a colorful carpet.
words.defineEn: a thick piece of woven cloth, used as a floor covering
words.defineVi: một mảnh vải dệt dày, được sử dụng làm lớp phủ sàn

examples: The medicine cabinet in the bathroom holds our first aid supplies.
They want the cabinet all singing from the same hymn sheet.
We installed a corner cabinet in the dining room to maximize space.
The shoe cabinet by the entrance keeps our shoes organized and tidy.
The cabinet doors are made of glass, allowing us to see inside.
words.defineEn: a piece of furniture with shelves or drawers for storing or displaying things
words.defineVi: một món đồ nội thất có kệ hoặc ngăn kéo để cất giữ hoặc trưng bày đồ đạc

examples: The soft rug in the living room adds warmth to the space.
We have a colorful rug in the children's playroom.
He lies like a rug.
The rug in front of the fireplace provides a comfortable spot to sit.
I rolled up the rug to clean the floor underneath it.
words.defineEn: something we use to cover or decorate a part of the floor that is usually made of thick materials or animal skin
words.defineVi: thứ gì đó chúng ta sử dụng để che hoặc trang trí một phần của sàn nhà thường được làm bằng vật liệu dày hoặc da động vật

examples: The stove is an essential appliance in every kitchen.
The gas stove has four burners for cooking multiple dishes at once.
I accidentally burned my hand on the hot stove.
I cooked dinner on the electric stove in the kitchen.
I boiled water on the stove to make a cup of tea.
words.defineEn: a box-shaped equipment used for cooking or heating food by either putting it inside or on top of the equipment
words.defineVi: một thiết bị hình hộp được sử dụng để nấu hoặc hâm nóng thức ăn bằng cách đặt nó bên trong hoặc bên trên thiết bị

examples: Cable TV reaches a huge audience.
The TV quiz was more fun than a barrel of monkeys!
The TV stays on all day in their house.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
She regularly appears on TV.
words.defineEn: an electronic device that shows images and videos and plays sounds and people use to watch different programs
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử hiển thị hình ảnh và video và phát âm thanh và mọi người sử dụng để xem các chương trình khác nhau
